label: SubordinateTradeLineItem
comment: A collection of information specific to a subordinate item being used or reported on for trade purposes.

datatypeProperties.comment: A product applicable for this subordinate trade line item.
The referenced product specified for this subordinate trade line item.
The trade agreement specified for this subordinate trade line item.
The delivery specified for this subordinate trade line item.
A trade settlement specified for this subordinate trade line item.

referencedBy.comment: A subordinate trade line item included in this supply chain trade line item.
